To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private DeMarkerIndicator _dem;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_dem = DEM(symbol, period, type);

// In OnData()
if (_dem.IsReady)
{
    var current = _dem.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.dem = self.DEM(symbol, period, type)

# In OnData()
if self.dem.IsReady:
    current = self.dem.Current.Value
